name: Amenoma Kageuchi
desc: Ünlü bir samuray için dövülmüş özel bir kılıç. Bu samuray, inanılmaz çeviklikleriyle bilinen tengu savaşçılarını bile yere serebiliyormuş.

desc.text:
Ünlü kılıç "Hakuen Michimitsu Amenoma"nın "kageuchi" kopyalarından bir tanesi.
Saimon Klanına, Iwakura Klanı reisi ve kurucusu Douin tarafından hediye edildi.
Bu hediye, Douin Konda Köyü'nde inzivadayken, Saimon Klanının ettiği yardımlara bir teşekkür olarak verildi.
Iwakura'nın gizli kılıç tekniği Tengu Savuranın, yalnızca kişinin kalbinde ufacık bile bir tereddüt yoksa kullanılabileceği söylenir.
Geçmişte "Tengu Savuran" ve "Tengu Galibi" aynı harflerle yazılıyordu. Tengu Savuran gökyüzündeki bir Tenguyu kesebilen bir kılıç saldırısıydı.
Yüzyıllar boyunca Iwakura'nın kılıç ustaları "In" adını nesilden nesile aldılar ve bu gizli kılıç hareketini Inazuma takımadalarının her yerinde sayısız iblisi yok etmek için kullandılar.
Efsaneye göre Tengu Savuranın ilk olarak, artık ışıkları yanmayan küçük bir tapınağın avlusunda bulunduğu söylenir.
Bu teknik o kadar güçlüydü ki tapınağı yok etti ve Iwakura Douin'in kılıcı da ortadan ikiye ayrıldı.
Daha sonra kılıç kullanma becerileri sayesinde Iwakura Sanatını kurdu ve Kujou Klanının eğitmeni oldu.
Ayrıca o zamanın Amenoma ustasına "In" soyu boyunca aktarılacak olan "Hakuen Michimitsu Amenoma" kılıcını yaptırdı.
Kılıç sayesinde yapılan iyilikler hakkında çok sayıda efsane vardır. Söylentilere göre, kılıç o kadar keskindi ki ölümlülerin kaderini bile ikiye ayırabilirdi.
Iwakura Douin, kılıcın bu uzun adının bu şekilde olması gerektiğini ise Amenoma'ya özellikle söylemiş.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Mercan Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Watatsumi Island is the furthest from Narukami Island in the Inazuman island chain, and its name means "the god of the oceans" in the island's ancient tongue. Legend has it that when the great serpent first arose within the abyssal nation of ever-night, its fluorescent body was covered in myriad-colored coral.

materials.name: Kaos Dişlisi
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
This is the energy source of that biomimetic mechanism.

materials.name: Eski Balçak
materials.desc:
A battle-worn handguard that was once mounted on an Inazuman blade.
For those adept in the art of the sword, the tsuba is a defense from the edge of an opponent's blade. For beginners, it is a defense made for their own right hand, to protect it from itself.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Kıymetli Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
This coral cannot be found anywhere in Teyvat, but was a gift that the great serpent obtained when it broke into the Dark Sea. For that abyssal snake, to be filled with coral was to be mighty, and its power would be shaved away as those corals were lost. In other words, those corals contain power far beyond the norm.

materials.name: Kaos Dişlisi
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
This is the energy source of that biomimetic mechanism.

materials.name: Eski Balçak
materials.desc:

For those adept in the art of the sword, the tsuba is a defense from the edge of an opponent's blade. For beginners, it is a defense made for their own right hand, to protect it from itself.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Kıymetli Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
This coral cannot be found anywhere in Teyvat, but was a gift that the great serpent obtained when it broke into the Dark Sea. For that abyssal snake, to be filled with coral was to be mighty, and its power would be shaved away as those corals were lost. In other words, those corals contain power far beyond the norm.

materials.name: Kaos Aksı
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
Even the great techniques and unknown power of this device must come to nothing should the machine that contained them ever fail to maintain structural integrity.

materials.name: Kageuchi Balçağı
materials.desc:
A handguard mounded upon a sword of some distinction.
Inazuma has a long tradition of sword-making. When making swords, smiths will often make several different weapons at once, before choosing from among them the "shinuchi," or the best weapon, while the others are known as "kageuchi."

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Yeşim Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Fleeing into the Dark Sea, the god that had lost everything met the abandoned people who had nothing within the ocean depths. Thus it elected to remain and become their "Orobashi no Mikoto," their "Watatsumi Omikami."
It is said that the great snake god once broke off all the coral branches on its body to give light to the children who were curled up in the darkness. They also say that it used these coral branches to create a huge ladder to allow those children to once again reach the surface and see the light of day.

materials.name: Kaos Aksı
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
Even the great techniques and unknown power of this device must come to nothing should the machine that contained them ever fail to maintain structural integrity.

materials.name: Kageuchi Balçağı
materials.desc:

Inazuma has a long tradition of sword-making. When making swords, smiths will often make several different weapons at once, before choosing from among them the "shinuchi," or the best weapon, while the others are known as "kageuchi."

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Yeşim Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Fleeing into the Dark Sea, the god that had lost everything met the abandoned people who had nothing within the ocean depths. Thus it elected to remain and become their "Orobashi no Mikoto," their "Watatsumi Omikami."
It is said that the great snake god once broke off all the coral branches on its body to give light to the children who were curled up in the darkness. They also say that it used these coral branches to create a huge ladder to allow those children to once again reach the surface and see the light of day.

materials.name: Kaos Gözü
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
The "Ruin" part of the name comes from the areas where they are most active. However, Ruin machines actually have little in common with the detritus in which they are often found.
In the ancient past, these ruins were once part of a civilization mighty enough to almost touch the dome of the firmament, while "ruin" still waits in the deep places of the earth, awaiting the order to arise and tread all kingdoms underfoot.

materials.name: Gösterişli Balçak
materials.desc:
An intricately-made handguard that was mounted upon a famed weapon.
Some believe that swords have souls and lives of their own, and thus deserve their own names. Those who love their blades will be acknowledged by them in turn. But those who see their swords as friends or even lovers should be warned that this relationship is built on death and bloodshed. The passions of those who dance with their blade amid crimson showers must surely be cooled someday by fickle steel.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Uzak Denizlerin Altın Dalı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The meaning that lies behind the name "Watatsumi" is simply the unrequited hopes that the abandoned people who dwelt in the deep sea pinned upon the serpent god that led them.
And it was also because the serpent god now had people who worshiped it that it stayed in the world it should have long fled, breaking off the coral branches that adorned its body, treading upon land where it should not have, and facing a foe it could never hope to match — till at last, its divine form was sundered along with the mountains, its ichor turned into plasma, and its will and power became a curse that could never be extinguished: Tatarigami.

materials.name: Kaos Gözü
materials.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
The "Ruin" part of the name comes from the areas where they are most active. However, Ruin machines actually have little in common with the detritus in which they are often found.
In the ancient past, these ruins were once part of a civilization mighty enough to almost touch the dome of the firmament, while "ruin" still waits in the deep places of the earth, awaiting the order to arise and tread all kingdoms underfoot.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc: Yashiro Heyetinden Kamisato Klanının kızı. Onurlu ve zarif olmasının yanı sıra bilge ve güçlüdür.

customize.text: • Amenoma Kageuchi'nin pasif özelliği <color=#ffe699>Element Becerisi</color> kullandıktan sonra Ayakaya <color=#ffe699>Enerji</color> verir. Bu pasif Ayaka'nın <color=#ffe699>Element Patlaması</color> 'nın yüksek maliyetini elde etmesinde yardımcı olur.

customize.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
customize.desc: Şu anda Liyue'nin Güneyhaçı Mürettabatında olan İnazumalı gezgin bir samuray. Nazik ve dizginlenemez bir doğası var ve kalbinde geçmişin yaralarını taşıyor.

customize.text: • Daha çok Kazuha'yı ana <color=#ffe699>Hasarı</color> verecek karakter olarak kullanacaksanız önerilir. Kazuha'nın <color=#ffe699>Element Becerisinin</color> bekleme süresi kısa olduğundan pasif özelliğinden daha çok yararlanabilir. Ek <color=#ffe699>Enerji</color> , Kazuha'nın <color=#ffe699>Element Patlamasını</color> daha çok kullanabilmesini sağlar.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: Favonius Şövalyelerinde başarılı bir kılıç ustası ve stratejik düşünür. Mondstadt'ın ötesinden geldiği söylenir.

customize.text: • Kaeya'yı yardımcı karakter olarak kullanacaksanız önerilir. Kaeya'nın <color=#ffe699>Element Becerisinin</color> bekleme süresi kısa olduğundan pasif özelliğinden daha çok yararlanabilir.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayato
customize.desc: Yashiro Heyetinden Kamisato Klanının genç fakat oldukça başarılı lideri. Görgülü ve nazik olmasının yanı sıra işini bilen imkan sahibi biridir.

customize.text: • Ayato için güzel bir silahtır. Ek <color=#ffe699>Enerji</color> , Ayato'nun <color=#ffe699>Element Patlamasını</color> daha çok kullanabilmesini sağlar.

value.text: Bir Element Becerisi kullanıldıktan sonra 1 Süreklilik Tohumu kazandırır. Bu etki 5 saniyede bir tetiklenebilir. Süreklilik Tohumu süresi 30 saniyedir. Aynı anda 3 taneye kadar Süreklilik Tohumuna sahip olunabilir. Bir Element Patlaması kullanıldıktan sonra, tüm Süreklilik Tohumları tüketilir ve 2 saniye sonra tüketilen her tohum için karakter 6/7.5/9/10.5/12 Enerji yeniler.

value.name: Plan: Yadigar Saimon Klanı Kılıcı
value.desc: Saimon Klanı, Amenoma Kageuchi'nin nasıl yapıldığını anlatan bu taslağa sahipti. Bunu kullanarak sen de bu silahı üretebilirsin.

value.name: Kuzey Diyarı Kılıç Prototipi
value.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

value.name: Ametist Parçası
value.desc: An uncut crystal that can only be found in Inazuma. Some professional craftsmanship will bring out its true value.

value.name: Beyaz Demir Parçası
value.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.
